pr_title: DB-8896 Introduce DB2 compatible parameter to csv read "" as empty string

timeline.message: DB-8896 Introduce DB2 compatible parameter to csv read "" as empty string

timeline.bodyText: I think our current behaviour is wrong (treating quoted empty strings as null). Shouldn't our default behaviour be the "DB2-compatible" one?
timeline.author: dgomezferro

replies.bodyText: @arnaud-splice brought me up to speed regarding yesterday's discussion.
